channel.title: CVE Feed for The BuddyPress Community -- all

item.title: CVE-2023-50880|2023-12-29T11:28:39.308Z -- the%20buddypress%20community -- buddypress
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in The BuddyPress Community BuddyPress allows Stored XSS.This issue affects BuddyPress: from n/a through 11.3.1.
